00094 
00095         void setFluidType(FluidType ft)         // set fluidType and phase index
00096         {
00097                 mFluidType = ft; 
00098                 oIndex = wIndex = gIndex = -1;
00099                 if(ft==GOW) { gIndex = 0; oIndex = 1; wIndex = 2; }
00100                 else if(ft==GO) { gIndex = 0; oIndex = 1; }
00101                 else if(ft==OW) { oIndex = 0; wIndex = 1; }
00102                 else if(ft==GW) { gIndex = 0; wIndex = 1; }
00103                 else if(ft==G) gIndex = 0;
00104                 else if(ft==O) oIndex = 0;
00105                 else if(ft==W) wIndex = 0;
00106                 else assert(false);
00107         }
00108 
00109         void setConnType(bool ct) { isMPConn = ct; }
00110         void setIsRestart(bool rest)  { isReStart=rest; }
00111         void setRstrtOutputCntrl(bool rest)  { RstrtOutputCntrl=rest; }         // $PS$: for restart
00112         void setCmdLinePar(int cmdpar)  { CmdLinePar = cmdpar; }                        // $PS$: check adjoint or POD or normal run
00113         void setCPGgridFlag(bool ct) { isCPGgrid = ct; }
